Messages.EmergencyButtonAlarmText: The emergency stop button was pressed.
Messages.GatesAlarmText: The gate is open until the line stops.
Messages.LowWorkAirAlarmHeader: Insufficient pressure in the pneumatic system of the working air.
Messages.LowWorkAirAlarmText: Insufficient pressure in the pneumatic system of working air.
Messages.LowControlAirAlarmHeader: Insufficient pressure in the control air system.
Messages.LowControlAirAlarmText: Insufficient pressure in the control air system.
Messages.SafetySwitchHeader: One of the safety switches has failed.
Messages.SafetySwitchText: One of the safety switches has failed.
Messages.CantCompleteCommandText: Unable to execute commands with the current state of the security loop.
Messages.LowShieldingGasPressureHeader: Insufficient pressure in the shielding gas system.
Messages.LowShieldingGasPressureText: Insufficient pressure in the shielding gas system for lyophilized beads.
